text:
Hi! I am working with a 3.2.3 jboss server.
I have the next code:

try {
	
		fileIn = new FileInputStream("C:\\Aplicaciones\\DFSS\\081105
\\CheckList\\CheckList.xls");
		POIFSFileSystem fs = new POIFSFileSystem(fileIn);
		HSSFWorkbook wb = new HSSFWorkbook(fs);
		HSSFSheet sheet = wb.getSheetAt(0);
		HSSFRow row = null;
		HSSFCell cell = null;
		int i;
		int r;
		r = sheet.getLastRowNum() + 1;
		System.out.print(r);
		boolean ext = false;
   		for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
    		row = sheet.getRow(i);
    		cell = row.getCell((short)0);
    		if (cell.toString().equalsIgnoreCase(fdm)) {
    			ext = true;
    		}
    	}
    	
    	try {
    		if (ext == false) {
    			short sht = new Integer(r).shortValue();
    			row = sheet.getRow(r);
            	if (row == null) {
            		row = sheet.createRow(sht);
            	}
            	cell = row.getCell((short)0);
    			cell.setCellValue(fdm);
    		}
    	} catch(Exception e) {
    		System.out.print(e.getMessage() + " Exception error");
    	} finally {
            if (fileOut != null)
                fileOut.close();
            if (fileIn != null)
                fileIn.close();
        }

	    fileOut = new FileOutputStream("C:\\Aplicaciones\\DFSS\\081105
\\CheckList\\CheckList.xls");
		wb.write(fileOut);
		fileOut.close();
		
	} finally {
		if (fileOut != null)
			fileOut.close();
		if (fileIn != null)
			fileIn.close();
	}


but in the line in where I try to create a new row... it gives me an error
     if (row == null) {
     	row = sheet.createRow(sht);
     }

I've already try with an int value and with a short value but it still gives me 
the error
